text: Mohammad Reza Rahimi (, born on 11 January 1949) is an Iranian politician who was first vice president from 13 September 2009 until 3 August 2013. On 15 February 2015, Rahimi was convicted of corruption and was sent to jail at Evin Prison. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Vice presidents of Iran
title: Mohammad Reza Rahimi
